title: Fivestar4everMVP
author: Fivestar4everMVP

Do you believe there are some games that carry ill luck with them, that no matter how long and how much the player wager, he or she never win significant amount of money?2. Which game have you won the most amount of money from?, and how much in total did you win from that game?Maybe you can also mention the game provider(Pragmatic, Evolution   etc.) so we can search for the game on our respective casinos and try it out.

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: You mentioned 3rd Party service providers, so I guess you want information on Slots? Well, third party Slot developers will give casinos several options for a RTP (Return to Player) for each of their Slots. The casinos cannot change that RTP as they want to ...say from a house edge of 3% to a house edge of say 80%..... because that is done on the 3rd party Slot providers side. So in theory.... all games should return a huge percentage of their bet income, back to the players over time. Some 3rd party Slot providers give casinos several different options for the RTP (Some Hacksaw Games have say three different RTPs that the casino can choose from)   It is luck...but also the RTP and Variance and the Client&Server seed that determine the winnings.... not the kind of game you play that never pays.
